author: Rachel Kraus
title: How to talk about coronavirus misinformation with the older people in your life
description: Your phone pings with another message in the family group text. It's grandma, sharing a block of text clearly copy and pasted from Facebook. "Be careful!" she writes, alongside news that you could get a ticket for driving during stay-at-home orders in Los Ang…
content:
Your phone pings with another message in the family group text. It's grandma, sharing a block of text clearly copy and pasted from Facebook.
"Be careful!" she writes, alongside news that you could get a ticket for driving during stay-at-home orders in Los An… [+6130 chars]
